---
name: 'BDD Scenario '
about: Create a BDD scenario for a feature.
title: 'BDD '
labels: feature
assignees: ''

---

**User Story:**
As a [type of user], I want [an action] so that [a benefit].

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Given [context], when [event], then [outcome].

**Scenario:**
```gherkin
Feature: [Feature Name]
  Scenario: [Scenario Name]
    Given [condition]
    When [action]
    Then [result]
